sourcesContent: import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { SlickCarouselComponent } from 'ngx-slick-carousel'; import { SlickItemDirective } from 'ngx-slick-carousel/slick.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { public images = [ { url: 'https://via.placeholder.com/600x400', title: 'Imagen 1' }, { url: 'https://via.placeholder.com/600x400', title: 'Imagen 2' }, { url: 'https://via.placeholder.com/600x400', title: 'Imagen 3' }, // ... ]; public slickConfig = { infinite: true, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 3, arrows: true, dots: true, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 3, infinite: true, dots: true } }, { breakpoint: 600, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 2 } }, { breakpoint: 480, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 } } ] }; // ... }
